LanguageData.LastDyingBreathHediff.label: "Last dying breath"
LanguageData.LastDyingBreathHediff.description: Strong mechanites placed in a compact package that block pain and prevent a person from getting injured after use, covering the entire body and forming a mobile exoskeleton. Nevertheless, as soon as the action of mehanites ceases, a person will die, failing to recover after fleeting rearrangements of the body.
